subject: Horse Racing
Barbaro (Race Horse)
Preakness Stakes
lead_paragraph: Gretchen and Roy Jackson’s Kentucky Derby winner Barbaro broke a leg in the 2006 Preakness Stakes. Now they have a horse in the race for the first time since then.
snippet: Gretchen and Roy Jackson’s Kentucky Derby winner Barbaro broke a leg in the 2006 Preakness Stakes. Now they have a horse in the race for the first time since then.
